name: Unit Test Runner
description: Compiles and runs unit tests for the project

test_shocker_model.prompt:
Please compile and run the ShockerModelTest unit test. Steps:

1. Compile: cmd.exe /c "C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\2022\Community\MSBuild\Current\Bin\MSBuild.exe" unittest/builds/VisualStudio2022/projects/ShockerModelTest.vcxproj /p:Configuration=Debug /p:Platform=x64

2. If successful, run: cmd.exe /c builds\bin\Debug-windows-x86_64\ShockerModelTest\ShockerModelTest.exe

3. Report: compilation status, test results (passed/failed), and any failure details.

test_all.description: Compile and test all unit tests
test_all.prompt:
Please compile and run all unit tests in the unittest/builds/VisualStudio2022/projects directory. For each .vcxproj file:

1. Compile it using MSBuild
2. Run the resulting executable
3. Track results

Provide a summary table showing: Test Name | Compilation | Tests Passed | Tests Failed
